full_summary:
# Tender Title and Information
## English Title
A Collection and Estimation of Underwater Biofouling of Commercial Vessels

## French Title
Une collecte et une estimation de l'encrassement biologique sous-marin des navires commerciaux

## Tender Reference Number
cb-8679-20360204

## Announcement Details
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is a solicitation by Fisheries and Oceans Canada for the provision of technical diving services for the collection and estimation of underwater biofouling of commercial vessels in major Canadian ports.

## Request Summary
The Government requires a contractor to collect biological samples and measurements of percent coverage of fouling organisms on commercial ships in the Halifax and Vancouver ports. The Contractor will provide a team of experienced technical divers who will collect underwater video, photos, and physical scrapings of biofouling organisms, estimate percent coverage, and provide comprehensive reports.

## Contract Period and Extension
The period of contract will be from the date of Contract award to June 30, 2024, inclusive, with two (2) additional option periods of one (1) year each.

## Tender Requirements
The Contractor must:

* Provide a team of technical divers with experience in commercial ship surveys and sampling.
* Collect biological samples and estimate percent coverage using video footage, images, and physical scrapings.
* Develop a comprehensive report of the biofouling conditions and percent coverage of the ship hull and niche areas.
* Provide all necessary diving and safety equipment.
* Arrange for the use of a dive boat.

## Intellectual Property and Trade Agreements
The Government will retain ownership of any intellectual property rights arising from the performance of the Work under the Contract. The requirement is subject to several international trade agreements, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions, please contact Mazen Obeid at (613) 299-2564 or mazen.obeid@dfo-mpo.gc.ca.

This tender announcement will close on September 8, 2023, at 14:00:00. Late submissions will not be accepted.

Download the detailed tender document here: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8679/30004874---rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender
